org.raistlic.common.codec

Class Deserializers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.codec.Deserializers

  • public final class Deserializers
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static factory methods that export commonly used Deserializer instances.
    Since:
    1.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deserializers() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Deserializer<java.math.BigDecimal> getBigDecimalDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.math.BigInteger> getBigIntegerDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Boolean> getBooleanDeserializer()
      The method exports a Deserializer instance that decodes a String target value into a Boolean , as long as it's a valid target (or the deserializer will throw an InvalidParameterException ).
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Byte> getByteDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Character> getCharacterDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Double> getDoubleDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Float> getFloatDeSerializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Integer> getIntegerDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Long> getLongDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.Short> getShortDeserializer() 
      static Deserializer<java.lang.String> getStringDeserializer()
      The method exports a Deserializer instance that simply returns what ever String target value passed in, given that the target is not null (or the deserializer will throw an InvalidParameterException ).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Deserializers

        public Deserializers()

    • Method Detail

      • getStringDeserializer

        public static Deserializer<java.lang.String> getStringDeserializer()
        The method exports a Deserializer instance that simply returns what ever String target value passed in, given that the target is not null (or the deserializer will throw an InvalidParameterException ).
        Returns:
        the stateless, singleton Deserializer instance.

      • getBooleanDeserializer

        public static Deserializer<java.lang.Boolean> getBooleanDeserializer()
        The method exports a Deserializer instance that decodes a String target value into a Boolean , as long as it's a valid target (or the deserializer will throw an InvalidParameterException ).
        Returns:
        the stateless, singleton Deserializer instance.
